description: Russia and China have struck a big deal that assures Gazprom a very big market in China for many years to come. We explain what Gazprom is and its strategy as a state-owned enrgy giant. Plus, Google may be planning to put ads in unusual places like thermostats, glasses, watches and refrigerators because it hopes to put its operating systems into the places as well. But peopl are already tuning out ads on their devices and TVs. So how hard will it be to ignore an ad when it becomes a bigger- and unavoidable- part of your daily routine? And should the ad industry be worried?
byline: Sally Herships, Sabri Ben-Achour, Tobin Low, Kate Davidson, Lane Wallace, Lauren Silverman, Nancy Koehn, Kai Ryssdal and Daisy Palacios
